Package com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class CommonEmailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailSender
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.CommonEmailSender
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheMailSender, JavaMailSender
    public abstract class CommonEmailSender
extends EmailSender
    Base class for Apache and JavaMail senders.

      • mMailId

        protected java.lang.String mMailId
        User id to log into SMTP server. If none is provided no authentication will be used.

      • mMailPassword

        protected java.lang.String mMailPassword
        User password to log into SMTP server. If none is provided no authentication will be used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommonEmailSender

        protected CommonEmailSender()
        Constructors. Loads mail configuration, and if it fails for some reason, mail sending becomes disabled.

      • getMailId

        public java.lang.String getMailId()
        Returns user id to log into SMTP server. If this value is null server authentication will be disabled.
        Returns:
        user id to log into SMTP server.

      • getMailPassword

        public java.lang.String getMailPassword()
        Returns user password to log into SMTP server. If this value is null server authentication will be disabled.

        user password to log into SMTP server.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Indicates if this mail sender controller is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, false otherwise.

      • isValidConfiguration

        private boolean isValidConfiguration​(java.lang.String mailHost,
                                     int mailPort,
                                     java.lang.String mailFromAddress)
        Indicates if provided configuration is valid by checking that SMTP server and mail from address are not null, and server port is valid.
        Parameters:
        mailHost - SMTP server host.
        mailPort - SMTP server port.
        mailFromAddress - email address to send emails from.
        Returns:
        true if configuration is valid, false otherwise.
